page.title: 06Employment-the Future.
page.content: There has been a constant decline over the last six years of jobs in the traditional local industries such as mining,nearby glass works and confectionary.In addition,a large nearby colliery is about to close while the Pontefract Colliery will remain under threat with its current financial losses. Unemployment is above the national average and stands at 14%.2,000 people are unemployed at present time,an increase of over 5% on the previous year. Future unemployment may be helped by some projected extensions in light industries. The town has a tradition for a large number of jobs for females.Liquorice factories and clothing works together with light engineering works have even provided jobs to suit "family hours".
